113221.content:
A few minutes after the explosion at the inventors recognition achievement, chief Jake McKenna slowly comes to his senses again.

"Uhn... what the hell happened?", he mumbles in his deep masculine voice while slowly opening his eyes. The last thing he remembers is Szalinski standing on stage, then some sort of clone(?) of him appeared and then... BOOM!

Slowly, he tries to lift himself off the floor, but doing so he notices that something seems to be very off!

11323.content:
After Wayne's trial in court all members of the Szalinski family and Chief Jake McKenna, now looking like a well-endowed woman in a green two-piece bikini due to a malfunction of Wayne's latest invention, gathered in front of the judge's office.

"I wonder why he wants to see you, chief!" said Wayne to the aforementioned, who was busy adjusting the jacket Diane, Szalinski's wife, gave him. "Perhaps he wants to ask you out on a date?" joked Amy, the daughter. "Amy! Don't say something like this again!", replied Diane and added "Did she upset you?" to the chief "No, not really! And since the judge knows how I look like under this... costume, I'd say he'd better had no interest in dating me!", said the chief, still in a very masculine voice.

Just then, the door to the judge's office opened, with the inhabitant appearing in the doorway. "Ah, I just wanted to call someone to call you, but I see you're already here! Come in!", he said in the chief's direction. The chief now looked at Diane, which gave him a reassuring glance. Then, he pretended a smile and walked in the judge's office...
11323.title: After the episode

113231.content:
"Well, my dear, take a seat!" the judge says as soon Chief McKenna is in the room. Still a little bit unused to his shifted center of gravity he steps to a nearby chair, takes off his much too large jacket and sits down on it. "You wanted to see me, sir?" he asks.

"Yes. First and most important, I want to congratulate you on your achievements in this rather tricky case! I'm sure that without your help, we wouldn't have found Klounberg as the real guilty in this case!". I just did my job, our honour!", the Chief replied, on which he had to blush - which looked rather flirtatious with his new appearance...

"Well, good work, but that's not everything I wanted to see you for! I have some assignment which asks for an officer with your expertise - and, actually, the looks you got...". "Huh?" replied the chief.

"You see, we need to get an undercover agent into..."
113231.title: Undercover assignment

choices: "you could go undercover as a stripper in one of their frequented clubs!"
1132311.content:
"... a drug-dealing gang!", the judge said and passed the chief a folder with some details.

After some minutes of busy reading, the chief lay the documents aside and said: "Okay, but how
do you want me to get in this crowd?".

"Well ...", said the judge...
1132311.title: a drug-dealing gang

11323112.content:
... when suddenly the phone on the desk in front of him started to ring.
"Hello? Yes? ... When? ... Yes, see... I'll call back later!" he said and ended the call.
"Well... it looks like we just found some way to get you in. Do you think Szalinski could,
should he have all necessary parts at hand, repair this... gadget in the next two days?".
"I suppose yes!" the chief said. "Chief Jake, It looks like we found a way to get you in
easy!" the judge said on which Chief McKenna felt a crawling in... well, his skin.

=============================
2 Days later at the Szalinski residence:
=============================

"Okay chief, I'm finished!", Wayne Szalinski said to Chief McKenna, still looking like
a woman but wearing a less revealing outfit now, whilst standing up from his desk with a gadget looking like
some sort of remote control in his hands.
"Then do it.", Jake said, on which Wayne pressed a button on the gadget.
A blue ray hit the chief, and as he finished glowing he was back in his more natural, manly form.
"Uh, good to be back again!", the chief said and felt up his body.
"But not for long, Chief! For the next step, you should undress." said Wayne.
"Why this?", the chief asked. " You know, this thing works with
projected forcefields to change matter. This means it basically converts
matter in some other form of matter, and when you push the revert button...".
"Okay, that's too much for me to take in! Just get it over with, will ya?", the
Chief replied.

On this, Szalinski pushed a button on the gadget. The next moment, Chief McKenna started to glow!
When he finished glowing, in Szalinski's workshop stood a ...
changed into a naked...
11323112.title: when suddenly his phone rings

1132321.content:
"Well, my dear, take a seat!" the judge says as soon Chief McKenna is in the room. Still a little bit unused to his shifted center of gravity he steps to a nearby chair, takes off his much too large jacket and sits down on it. "You wanted to see me, sir?" he asks.

"Yes. First and most important, I want to congratulate you on your achievements in this rather tricky case! I'm sure that without your help, we wouldn't have found Klounberg as the real guilty in this case!". I just did my job, our honour!", the Chief replied, on which he had to blush - which looked rather flirtatious with his new appearance...

"Well, good work, but that's not everything I wanted to see you for!", the judge says and retrieves two glasses and a bottle of whine from the desk in front of him.
"Congratulations again!", he says while pouring whine into both their glasses, then the both of them clink glasses and drink the content down in a few gulps.
"Aah, that's a good brand!", the Chief says and pours in some more!

The whole ordeal continues for some time, until the judge finally says something: "So Chief, I'm a bit curious... tell me, how does it feel for you to be a woman?".
"Erm, well... it's a bit strange! You know... before, I really had to go into the Lady's restroom, that was a rather strange experience!", the Chief answers.
"So everything on your new body-", the Judge tries to ask but is interrupted! "Yes, VERY much the real thing!".
"That's good to hear!" the Judge says - and pushes a button on the table's underside!
Suddenly, the door locks!

"What the-", the Chief tries to query, but the Judge interrupts him!
"Before you say anything, I think you should look at this!", the mentioned says, pulls out a remote control from under the desk and pushes a button on it!
Suddenly, a TV screen behind the Chief comes to life!
The Chief looks on the screen, in it he sees the Szalinski's...
handcuffed and with several police officers around them!

"So Chief, if you want to see them again, you have to do something for me!
That is...".
1132321.title: The judge wants to do 'her'

choices: Cleo and Lewis at Mako Island
1511.title: own storyline

15111.content:
It is a calm and beautiful night at Mako Island. After finally getting rid of Charlotte, Cleo and Lewis decided to rekindle their love. So they decided to spend a special night on Mako Island...

Sitting at the moon pool, Lewis stares at the water. Suddenly Cleo's head resurfaces and slowly she swims over to him. "Hey, how was it on the bottom of the sea?" he says with a slight smile on his face."Like usual...Ooh! Lewis, I'm really sorry that you can't experience this too!" she says as she realizes her slip of the tongue. She puts her hands around his body and pulls herself out of the water. Then, she kisses him! "It's not so bad, as long as I have you!", he says. Just then, he looks up and notices something! "Have you seen this?" he says and points to the moon which looks rather strange that night! "Maybe you should get out of the water!" he says and stands up to get a towel. As he comes back, Cleo looks up and smiles at him. But just then, he slips... and falls right into the moon pool!
15111.title: Cleo and Lewis at Mako Island

choices: Lewis stays a merman and eventually this is fixed.
Lewis does not stay a merman indefinitely like the girls.
1511121.content:
It was a new moon that looked so strange in the sky
through the roof hole. Since new moons are opposite
of full moons, the moon pool starts bubbling just the
same as when the girls first became mermaids early
last year. {This is after Charlotte has lost her powers}
At first, things seem alright as Lewis begins to change
into a merman. His power would have become the
opposite of Cleo's if the other two hadn't swum into
the pool from the tunnel at that precise moment. Cleo
asks them why they're here and they say they both
had to come involuntarily.

Now everyone gets all mixed together. Lewis does
receive all 3 powers like Charlotte did. However, after
everything settles down and Cleo compliments Lewis
on his VERY long new tail, the complications quickly
appear. They discover that when any of the girls tries
to use her power, it now comes out of Lewis. Making
things more interesting Lewis can also see through the
girls eyes and feel what ever they're feeling at the time.
As soon as they stop trying to use their power every
thing goes back to normal.

Looking at the bright side Cleo says, "Well Lewis at
least now you're able to see the ocean like we do."
"Thanks for small favors," he says.


Which direction are their lives going now?
1511121.title: He becomes a merman

choices: The owner comes to town looking for the book.
Someone else comes to town looking for the book.
Lewis is contacted in the mail about the book.
1512.content:
In Season 2 Episode 5: "Hocus Pocus"

Lewis finds & buys a book on mermaids on the Internet.
He convinces them to help him make a wishing potion.
It ends up in a disaster with the book being destroyed.

Three questions occur:
1) If the book really was so valuable, why did it sell so cheap?
2) Assuming the book was a rare find why would anyone
in their right mind auction it off on the Internet without
having a very high minimum price that a High School
kid like Lewis could never afford? After all, it is shown
in other episodes that he doesn't have much money.
3) What if the book was mistakenly sold & the owner is
looking to retrieve it for his(her) rare book collection?

So one or more episodes are somewhat implied in the
way that this episode ends. This book could turn out to
be very important to the mermaids future and/or safety.

Since Season 3 and beyond(?) haven't been seen yet
it is advisable that all 3 choices occur shortly after the
girls have taken Charlotte's powers away & before any
thing from Season 3.
Depending on the direction and end of Season 3, after
it finishes maybe this whole storyline could be changed,
if it would make things more interesting for ALL of the
mermaids & other people from Season 3.
1512.title: Season 2, Episode 5  "Hocus Pocus"

15121.content:
It is now a week after Charlotte lost her powers. A 20 or so year old young man arrives in town desperately looking
for the "Mermaid Book". Nearly 3 years ago, he was in a terrible plane wreck and was declared dead at the crash.
In actuality, he was in a very deep coma that made it look like he was dead. He was the second oldest in the family
and when his grandfather died 2 years before then he had left Thor (don't ask) his collection of rare books that he had
assembled over his 85 year life. Many of these books dealt with spiritual issues & mythological creatures including
the book on mermaids that Lewis had purchased on the Internet several months ago. His older brother was jealous
because he thought that being the oldest he "deserved" to inherit those books and other things.

His older brother is a compusive gambler that had an extremely bad streak playing the ponies. After the crash, he
convinces the enforcer sent by the bookie that he can pay it all back selling his 'dead' brother's rare book collection.
which he proceeds to do. Unfortunately for his brother, Thor didn't truly die and so last month when he suddenly came
out of his coma, pandemonium erupts. His brother is arrested for grand theft. Fortunately, since he wanted to keep
the theft and sale secret he had sold all the loot on the Internet. The ISP was very accommadating with providing the
true name & address of all the purchasers when it was informed that all the goods were stolen. Most of the items
are quickly returned although very reluctantly by some of the purchasers. This book however, along with several other
items Thor felt needed to be retrieved in person. Some of the other items being returned were not in the same shape
as when they were sold.

He arrives in town with his new step-sister that he met for the first time when he woke up from the coma. She also is
20 years old and is traveling with him because he is still weak from the coma. So he cannot yet drive & he has weak
spells needing attention. They drive up in a station wagon and who do they see first?
15121.title: The owner comes to town looking for the book.

choices: Charlotte tells Cleo about Thor & that it's very important that he find Lewis.
She tells Cleo it's none of HER business & to tell Lewis SHE's looking for him.
1512121.content:
After the long flight, Thor's step-sister Rhiannon (Re for short) was very protective and kept him in the
hotel room for 2 days to allow him to rest up from the flight. When they arrived she rented a car and
got road maps for the area. After a hearty breakfast she is driving over to the address on the e-mail
that came with the payment for the "Mermaid book". When they were driving by one of the local docks
for fishermen, Thor tells Re to stop driving. He sees Charlotte sitting at the end of the dock looking
out at the Ocean in the direction of Mako Island. Stopping he asks Re to get out, walk to Charlotte
and ask her to come over to the car. Surprised about all this, at first she's reluctant but after thinking
about it, what harm can occur so she agrees. Seeing her walking to the car, Thor rolls down the car
window all the way. He motions her to learn near the window, after which he whispers that he knows
that she was once a mermaid. She's surprised by his bold statement & tries to deny it. He then says
that she should feel no shame in no longer being a mermaid. Upon hearing this, she starts crying.
Re seeing that she's crying, approaches the car and Thor waves her off.

The next thing that Thor says so surprises Charlotte, she faints. After being revived with smelling salts,
Charlotte starts shaking and asks him, "What are you?". Thor had told her that by looking at any girl
he could tell if they are or had been a mermaid. He refuses to tell how he's able to do it. He then asks
her if she knows who Lewis is and if she would be willing to go with him to Lewis's house. She's quite
skeptical about it but is more curious to see Lewis's face when she introduces Thor to Lewis. So she
gets in their car and Re drives to Lewis's home. No one answers the door, but as they turn around
Cleo walks up and asks Charlotte why is she at Lewis's place?
1512121.title: Charlotte

choices: When they return Lewis is home.
When they return Lewis still isn't home.
15121212.content:
Wondering just what's going on, Cleo gets very defensive about Lewis. She tells Charlotte if SHE wants to
talk to Lewis she'll have to find him herself. Besides, who's that guy and girl in that car. Again Charlotte
says none of your business, they're here to see Lewis about something that doesn't concern you. Well,
if that's how you're going to be, then GOOD BYE! Cleo walks away fuming. She doesn't use her powers
on Charlotte because Thor & Re can see everything from the car & she doesn't want to risk exposing her
powers to outsiders. Charlotte really wishes that she still had her powers now.

Charlotte gets back in the car and the three of them decide to just stay there. After,all whether sooner or
later Lewis is bound to return home. While waiting for Lewis to return, Thor tells Charlotte about the book
on Mermaids that Lewis had bought from his crooked brother. Although she was a mermaid he doesn't
tell her that the spells and other things in it really work, if prepared properly. He only has 4 doses left of
the wishing compound and needs the book for the formula to make more. {Near his home lives a mermaid
that he has known for years.} He also wants to retrieve the book to keep it out of the wrong hands. After
waiting there for a couple of hours they decide to go get some lunch and then come back after wards.
15121212.title: She tells Cleo it's none of HER business & ...

choices: Can Rikki get out of the car without Re seeing her?
What were those 2 wishes & who benefits from them?
151212122.content:
It's about an hour after they came back from lunch when it dawns on Charlotte that Cleo might have
run into Lewis and told him to stay away from his house. So she suggests that they move the station
wagon around the corner and that she and Re climb up in a tree in Lewis's front yard to hide. That way
if he was looking to see if they were still there he would think that they had given up and left. Thor then
suggests one of them take a phone so they can call him when Lewis comes home. Maybe 20 minutes
later, Rikki walks by the car on her way to visit Lewis. Thor sees her, realizing that she is a mermaid
he calls to her. {She hadn't seen Cleo that day so she doesn't know what's going on.} She approaches
the car asking him,"Who are you and what do you want?" Thor replies, "I need your help and please
would you get in this car?" Seeing how pale he looks, she leans in through the back window to politely
turn him down. He then says, " I'd prefer you to do it voluntarily, otherwise I'll just have to force you to
climb in while you still can." "Riight, and just how do you plan to do that?" she replies as she starts
straightening up preparing to leave. Without hesitating Thor says, "This way!" He quickly throws a liter
cup of water at Rikki hitting her full in the face & most of it soaks into her hair. Knowing what will be
happening in a few seconds and realizing that she now has no choice, Rikki starts climbing through the
window just as she starts her transformation. Thor then pulls her fully in before she completes turning
into a mermaid. He's exhausted and hits the redial button on the phone so that his sister & Charlotte
come running. Rikki is unable to completely dry herself before they arrive. Fortunately for Rikki when
he helped to pull her into the back of the station wagon he covered up her lower body. He didn't want
anybody walking by seeing her tail.

While all of this is going on, up in the tree Charlotte and Re have been talking about Thor. Re confesses
to Charlotte that she dearly needs for Thor to 'jump her bones'. Even though were both adults when he
woke up and they officially first met, he won't because their parents are married. Charlotte is mystified
why Re feels that way and she is truthfully unable to explain it. This is the main reason why she was so
quick on volunteering to travel with him on his trip to reclaim all his stolen items. Having recently lost
Lewis to Cleo, Charlotte sympathizes with her plight and silently vows to help her if she thinks of a way.
It's about this time that Thor calls them. Before passing out he says, "Come quick, The solution to my
problem is ...." Jumping out of the tree, they dash around the corner to the car, with absolutely no idea
about what he was talking about before he fainted.

Now desperately terrified that her secret will be revealed, Rikki isn't that relieved to see the girl arriving
with Charlotte. She's pretty certain that Charlotte will help her to keep her secret, if she can. Seeing
who's in the car, Charlotte tells Re, "get in and drive to where you're staying." Re hadn't seen RIkki in
the back and so when they return to the hotel she hops out to get her step-brother's medicine. Seeing
their opportunity Charlotte crawls into the back to help Rikki finish drying her hair. It's then that Thor
wakes up telling them to stop. He needs the girl to stay a mermaid for only a short while. He then tells
Charlotte to keep his sister away from the car for a few minutes. Now seeing Rikki in all her splendor,
he says out loud (without realizing it.) "Great, out of all 5 types I had to catch a "Fire mermaid!" Both
Rikki and Charlotte are mystified over why he said that there are 5 types of mermaid. Charlotte however
does leave to intercept his sister before she returns to see Rikki's tail. That is something that all 3 of
them would prefer not having to explain.

By this time Rikki is so angry at Thor she could kill him. Sensing her mood he tries to quickly explain
to her why he did what he did. He mentions the book that Lewis had bought from his crooked brother &
that he wants it back. Although she knows that it works, Rikki doesn't let on knowing about the book.
He asks her to get the tin out of the glove compartment. Wanting to get this nightmare over with Rikki
retrieves it for him. Opening the tin he puts 2 fingers in so that he can quickly make 2 wishes. Before
she can react he smears it on both sides of her face, makes his wishes and passes out again.

It's at this time that Charlotte and Re reappear, Charlotte just couldn't stall any longer. Being in the lead
Charlotte signals to Rikki to stay hidden. It's not easy when you're an over 7 foot long mermaid including
tail but Rikki manages to do so. When they open the car door Re sees the tin and picks it up saying,
"I wonder why he got this out?" Before Charlotte can ask Re what it is, Re tells Charlotte that he had
told her on their flight that if he died that she was to take this tin to a run-down mansion. He had a key
and she was to ring the doorbell. If a young lady answers the door, she was to give it to her and if she
didn't answer the door, Re was to use the key to enter and wait for her return. She may need to stay a
few days but the young lady would be sure to return. Re was to then give her the tin and tell the young
lady where and when he died. I think she's a girlfriend that he has and wants no one else in the family
to know about. Obviously, he knew her for a long time before his accident.



Now, before all you readers fall asleep, we have 2 questions here:
151212122.title: When they return Lewis still isn't home.

choices: Rikki learns more about why she's so special & things fall apart.
Rikki learns more about why she's so special & things work out.
1512121222.content:
Charlotte volunteers to give Thor his medicine. She doesn't want Re getting in the
back of the car and see Rikki. Re gives the packet to Charlotte and thanks her for
the help. As she is crawling into the back Charlotte drops her jacket and some more
things so that Rikki is covered better. While they wait for Thor to wake up, Charlotte
tries to maneuver Re away from the back of the car so Rikki can make her escape.
She succeeds only in keeping Re from looking in the rear compartment, Rikki's hair
still hasn't dried enough for her to return to human. Just then Charlotte's mobile rings.
It's Cleo, she and Lewis are at his house. Things are sure getting more complicated.
Charlotte gives Cleo the address of the hotel and suggests that they come over as
quickly as they can. When she hangs up she tells Re that the person her brother is
looking for will be arriving there soon. "Why don't you go wait in your room. I can help
your brother up there when he wakes up." Re agrees and heads for the nearest stair
well. "Finally,I can get out of here." Rikki says. Charlotte goes to help Rikki finish
drying her hair and then escape from this crazy person, as far as Rikki is concerned.

Poor Rikki, she just can't get a break today. Just as Re had started up the stairwell,
she turned around, returning to the car. She'd left her room key on the front seat. So
Charlotte asked her since she hadn't gone up there, "why don't you go and get some
food for us while we wait. Your brother might not be in the mood to go out to eat. It is
getting towards dinner time. Re starts to wonder why Charlotte keeps trying to keep
her away from the car. However, she is getting a little hungry herself and since she
won't know what Lewis looks like & Charlotte does, she agrees to get dinner for all
four of them. She figures her brother will probably be hungry when he awakes like he
usually is when he recovers from one of his fainting spells.

Charlotte keeps looking in the direction that Re had walked off to just in case she
should return again. Telling Rikki that she can now continue drying her hair, Rikki
again says, "Finally, I sure hope nothing else goes wrong." As soon as Rikki has
finished, she realizes she shouldn't have said that. Thor has wakened up & he grabs
one of her arms. She starts struggling but being so wrapped up she can't get much
leverage so he's able to hang on. His strength is returning. He asks Rikki her name.
She refuses to answer. He sees that they are now parked outside his hotel, so he
asks Charlotte to help him get up. She agrees, but only if he lets go of Rikki. That
he's not willing to do yet. So with one mermaid still struggling in his grip Thor does
the only thing he knows will work, he puts both of his hands around Rikki's throat.
Thinking he's going to strangle her, she panics. In her panic she starts heating up
the inside of the car. It starts smoking, Charlotte tells Rikki, "Stop that!, the smoke
will attract a crowd." The smoke stops because she has now passed out. Thor then
tells Charlotte to help him carry Rikki's body up to his room. She's appalled at what
she is now involved with but is to afraid to do anything to oppose him. She helps him
carry Rikki's limp body up to his room. It is rolled up inside an 8 foot long rug that
has somehow appeared in the car. At least, Charlotte doesn't recall seeing it earlier.

Once they are in the room, he tells Charlotte to open the door to the large bathroom
so that they can put her body there. Then he says, "go downstairs and wait for Re to
return with dinner." She complies without saying anything. As soon as she steps off
the elevator, she sees Lewis and Cleo entering the lobby. They both ask Charlotte,
"What's going on here?" Charlotte replies,"I REALLY don't know. This guy must be
crazy!" They ask her, "Why do you think that Charlotte?" Starting to hyperventilate,
Charlotte replies, "I think he intends to do something terrible to Rikki!" "Rikki!", they
say. All of this has been a little too loud because a small crowd has collected around
them and the manager has called security. Noticing the crowd, Charlotte suggests that
they go outside to the station wagon to intercept Re when she arrives with dinner.

Meanwhile upstairs, Thor has revived Rikki. She is apoplectic. Noticing that they are
now alone she decides that she has had enough and yells at him. "If you don't let me
go right now, you'll see just how angry a mermaid can get!!" Kneeling in the doorway
and clearly tired when she yells at him, he starts crying. Rikki is besides herself she
just can't believe this. This maniac who obviously must want to do something terrible
to her is breaking down. It doesn't weaken her resolve to escape. He then says to her
something that totally stuns her. "Please, fire mermaid I haven't intended to harm you.
If you will just let me kiss you I'll explain." Knowing he has already tried to strangle
her once, she only agrees because she'll be ready this time. If he tries that again she
intends to kill him.

Rikki is sitting in the over-sized tub, her hair had finally dried enough for her to return
to her human body. As he approaches her she is fully prepared to defend herself. So
she is totally stunned when he starts French kissing her. It feels like she does when
she turns into a mermaid, only she doesn't. The kiss lasts well over a minute and she
is still in her human body. When he stops, the first words out of her mouth are, "What
on Earth have you done to me? Why did I feel the way I did when you kissed me?"
Now very terrified and lowering her voice she asks, "Am I still a mermaid?" "Oh, yes"
he tells her. "You're now a very special mermaid. My name is Thor, what's yours?"
"Rikki" she says. He then tells her about making those two wishes earlier that day.
The second one was specifically for her to make up for the inconvenience he was
going to put her through. With one exception, you're the most beautiful mermaid that
I've ever met. Hearing this, she interrupts him, "What do you mean, I'm the second
most beautiful mermaid, just how many mermaids have you met?" Dozens, he replies.
By now, she's willing to accept anything he says. "Still, what has happened to me?"
Rikki asks plaintively. "Just as I wished for you, Rikki, you no longer need to fear water.
You can now take a real bubble bath again! In fact Rikki, now whenever you come into
contact with water you can choose whether or not to turn into a mermaid. Isn't that a
dream come true for you?" She replies, "Yes, that sounds wonderful, but what about
my friends?" At this point, Thor really isn't interested in talking about her friends. He
thinks that she's just talking about regular people and not other mermaids. He's about
to explain more about his wish to Rikki when there is a loud knock at the door.

During Rikki's reconciliation with Thor, things downstairs have been jumping. The
manager had kept an eye on Charlotte and the others when they walked out. Once
security arrived they went out to question them about why they were there and just
what was Charlotte talking about. Still very upset, Charlotte is very reluctant to say
much. She's concerned she may let something slip about the girls being mermaids.
It was at this time that Re shows up with dinner. Not knowing what's going on she
walks right into the mess. By now, security had called the police. They figured that
the police would be able to get to the bottom of this. Finally, Charlotte has calmed
down enough for the police to assume that Thor had kidnapped Rikki for something
very bad. So they go into the hotel to settle the matter. Re was placed under arrest
so that she could not warn her step-brother that the police were coming for him.

When the police order Thor to open the door, he replies, "I'm sorry, but I don't need
you. You must have the wrong room. Would you please leave me alone." Hearing him
loudly close the bathroom door the police assume that he's trying to flee and so they
break down the front door. He's standing near the bathroom door when they enter.
He's quite annoyed that they interrupted him. Not grasping that they're dead serious
he angrily tells the police again to leave. {It is really not Rikki's day.} She accidentally
drops a bottle in the bathroom, the noise alerts the police that someone is in there.
When they ask Thor who is in there, he doesn't reply. Then he makes a move that
the police interpret as going for a gun and they shoot him. Within seconds, he's on
the floor with several bullets in him. The very loud gunfire upsets Rikki so much she
stumbles falling into the tub. However, when the police searches the bathroom and
the large bathtub Rikki had fallen in, they don't see her. Noticing the broken bottle is
so close to the shelf they figure if fell off by itself.



What happened to Rikki and do things work out okay?


Off-hand I really didn't see how to write both wishes into the story, so here they are.
Further pieces will explain who will be affected by the first wish. As you can see in
the section below, Thor made it only for Rikki's benefit. (And her future family)
Incidentally, Rikki WILL learn why Thor said that there are 5 mermaid versions.

Thor's first wish was: I wish that any female virgin, who within 50 leagues of this place
learns mermaids are real shall become a mermaid on the night of the next full moon.
She will only transform into a mermaid when the moon is above the horizon and salt
water touches her skin. Unable to change back to her human body until the moon sets
she will not receive any mermaid powers. Should she become pregnant her mermaid
transformation will stop for 30 full moons. All pregnancies will result only in live births.

Thor's second wish: I wish that when I kiss the 'fire mermaid' that I'm touching, she
will acquire the ability to choose when and how to transform her mermaid body. All
of her female descendants will become a 'fire mermaid' when they are the same age
as she was when she first became a mermaid.
1512121222.title: What were those 2 wishes & who benefits from them?

choices: Al wishes to be young again
1551.content:
The baywatch team has again a lot of work this summer here on the beautiful beach of Malibu. Today there is an emergency and the oldest baywatch team member Al is on duty. Her is very experienced and did his job for many years. But this session is his last and he can finally retire. The woman in the water is screaming for help and Al runs to help her….
As Mitch sees the situation and realizes that Al is to slowly this time he starts to run and saves the life of this woman….
The situation gets bad as the captain reads the report and thinks that Al has be sent to retirement immediately and he doesn’t want him to take the complete season….
1551.title: yes- baywatch

choices: Mitch from baywatch team to comfort him
the post man with a package....
15512.content:
Today was such an awful day in Al’s life. He never failed in his job before and always was one of the fastest. He even won a price some years ago and got some personal letter and invitation from governor Schwarzenegger….
But now this seems to be past and never will come back. With a tear in his eyes Al sat all alone in his little apartment and opened a can of beer to wash away his pain and he watched some TV- nothing on- damn life he thinks as the TV program shows one of those stupid commercial advertisement where some old lady said “with this pill I feel young and fit…”
Al wished that he would have such pills and they would really work…. He took another can of beer and was nearly drunken as his door bell rings and he opened…
Who was there?
15512.title: Al wishes to be young again

choices: throw everthing away - this is nonse and drink one more beer instead
155122.content:
It was some guy from fed-ex, who brings a speed delivery. Al didn’t remember that he ordered something and did not expect any delivery. Anyhow he accepts the package since he had nothing to pay.
Curiously he opens the box. There was no sender written on the box, so Al still didn’t know what he will receive there. His worst thought was that this could maybe a good-bye present from the baywatch team, but it wasn’t.
Inside the box were some small bottles, kind of vials…and some piece of paper, a letter to be precise.
Al started to read this strange message, with still no sender on it.
The content was:
“Dear Al,
we heard your prayers to be young again and can offer you 365 small bottles, for exact one year content to be young again. Just take the full content of one bottle and you will be young for 24 hours!
Have fun”
No signature or something else, only the small bottles.
155122.title: the post man with a package....

choices: Master Roshi learns Oolong's shapeshifting technique!
155231.content: Oh, Dragonball Z... many options there! What storyline?
155231.title: Dragonball Z

1552312.content: Chi Chi gets a wish on the Dragon balls
1552312.title: Something else

15531.content:
Prue, Piper and Phoebe move into the mansion of their dead grandma. Suddenly the find some book on the attic, which is called “the book of shadows”. This tells them that their ancestors have been witches and that they have also some special magical powers.
Phoebe gets to know that she is able to see into the future. Piper can stop time and Prue can move things. Of course they have to scope with their new situation. While they try to do this, Prue’s boyfriend, inspector Trudeau has to find a women’s serial killer. All of his victims seem to be witches….
15531.title: yes- charmed

15532.content: How about a cartoon instead? Why not try "The Fairly Oddparents"?
15532.title: Cartoons?

155321.content: Do you want male or female?
155321.title: Fairly Oddparents

1553211.content: How about the star of the show, Timmy Turner?
1553211.title: Male.

1553212.content: How about Tootie? She's everyone's favourite girl on the show...well, except for me!
1553212.title: Who to transform?

15532121.content: You watch as Tootie becomes softer and more slimey as she turns an unhealthy brown. Her body shrinks down to size. Gravity does all the rest as the pile falls...
15532121.title: Literally a Piece of S***

15532222222.content: How about a show with dogs in it?
15532222222.title: Maybe one of these?

155322222222.content: Now then which Paw Patrol member will transform?
155322222222.title: PAW Patrol

choices: Ryder, the human boy and leader of the PAW Patrol
1553222222222.content: Maybe one of these characters?
1553222222222.title: Open choice chapter

15532222222221.content: What should happen to Chase?
15532222222221.title: Chase

155322222223.content: Would you be interested in Ed Edd n Eddy?
155322222223.title: No way! Next choice, please!

1553222222231.content: So, which Ed Edd n Eddy character will change?
1553222222231.title: yes

155322222223132.content: What about the Kanker Sisters?
155322222223132.title: Someone else

1553222222232.content:
What about Once Upon A Time?

It would be fun to see what kind of magical transformations can occur to the characters.
1553222222232.title: Off to Maine

15533.content: what else could it be?
15533.title: something else

info.brief_description: Change or transform the characters of your favorite TV shows in any way you like!
info.description:
Change or transform the characters of your favorite TV shows in any way you like!

Rules:
- Don't make characters too OOC! You can adjust for the changes, but don't change the character too rapidly!
- Keep the established settings (in-universe) of the shows in mind!

Besides this, everything goes!
